column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Let me just say being vegan for the last few weeks have been awesome and my taste buds definitely opened up
column2: this ramen bowl has so much flavor and the veggies add just the right touch. I sub the tofu with mushrooms this time around
column3: didn't care for the tofu much but in other words this definitely can compete with all the regular ramen bowls.
